what.title: What is Kit Digital?
what.description: Kit Digital is a Spanish Government grant program to boost digitalization of small businesses and freelancers. It consists of subsidies up to €12,000 to contract digital solutions.

requirements.title: Requirements
items: Be a freelancer or company with 0 to 49 employees
Not be in crisis according to EU regulations

cta.title: Want to know if you can access it?
cta.description: We help you with the entire application process

hero.title: About Nixi
hero.description: Web development with real code in Granada

story.title: Who I Am
story.content: I'm Miguel Toyas Pernichi, a web developer in Granada. I created Nixi because I saw too many businesses trapped with slow, limited, and hard-to-update websites built with WordPress. My goal is simple: create fast, secure, and 100% custom websites using modern technologies like React and Next.js.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Clear pricing from the start. No surprises. No fine print.

quality.title: Quality over Quantity
quality.description: I prefer a few well-done projects over many mediocre ones. You are my priority.

local.title: Personal Service
local.description: I'm in Granada. We can meet in person and talk calmly.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Web development advances fast. I stay up to date with the latest technologies.
